subject: Martial Arts
Mixed Martial Arts
Robberies and Thefts
Sentences (Criminal)
lead_paragraph: Charles Rowan, a Michigan fighter, was sentenced to 17 ½ to 40 years in prison for robbing a gun store a month after he tried to escape a drug debt by convincing everyone that he had died.
snippet: Charles Rowan, a Michigan fighter, was sentenced to 17 ½ to 40 years in prison for robbing a gun store a month after he tried to escape a drug debt by convincing everyone that he had died.
